evidence.text: 58   MEMORANDUM AND ORDER granting 47 MOTION to Compel Production and For Discovery Sanctions. Within twenty (20) days of the entry of this Order, the defendant shall produce all non-privileged documents responsive to the plaintiffs requests for production nos. 1-4, 8 and 9 in accordance with the Courts November 8, 2017, ESI Order 40. Any claim of privilege must be accompanied by a privilege log.(Signed by Judge Kenneth M Hoyt) Parties notified.(chorace) (Entered: 04/10/2018)

extracted.value: The court granted Plaintiffs' Motion to Compel Production and For Discovery Sanctions on April 10, 2018 (Docket #58).
